parameters:
\N<Painter>I travel around painting pictures and sell them to make a
living.

\N<Painter>I'm not from this town... I managed to avoid participating
in the military drills, but it looks like I'll be staying
here for a while.

\N<Painter>Well, it's a good opportunity. I'll take this time to
confront my own work and talent.
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■Event■>
\N<Segi>Um... I've read the request board at the management office.
\N<Painter>You have? Are you going to accept my request?
\N<Segi>Yes. Am I not capable of helping you?
\N<Painter>Hmm... no, not at all. You are more than capable.

\N<Painter>Besides, it's not a particularly difficult job. I have no
intention of asking about your experience either.
\N<Segi>Is that so? That's a relief. So... um, what should I do...?

\N<Painter>Well then, let's get to work right away. Could you come over
here?
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Painter>What I want from you is nothing else but to be a model for a
nude painting.

\N<Painter>Of course, I will pay you accordingly. And I promise not to
lay a single finger on your body.

\N<Segi>W-wait a minute, please... A nude painting, that...! I can't
do... such a thing...

\N<Painter>You can't? Are you saying you refuse? That would be...
problematic. It would cause significant delays in
production...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>...Understood, let's do this. You don't need to take off
your clothes. Can you just lie down on the bed as you are?
\N<Segi>Just as I am...?

\N<Painter>Yes, that would be fine, wouldn't it? Please... I'm begging
you.

\N<Segi>...Understood. Since I've already accepted the offer, if
that's the case...
i_1_セギ05uu
i_1_セギ05u
\N<Segi>Um... may I ask you something?
\N<Painter>...Yes, of course. You must be bored just lying there.
i_1_セギ05a

\N<Segi>...Thank you. It's strange to ask after accepting such a
request, but I can't quite understand the taste for art...

\N<Segi>But you seem to be very passionate and committed to your
dream. Why... can you be so earnest?

\N<Painter>The reason I pour my dreams into art... That's a valid
question indeed. However, I'm sorry to disappoint you with a
simple answer.

\N<Painter>It's to satisfy my feelings with things I find beautiful. To
fill this hungry and empty heart with my own aesthetic
sense.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>I have traveled to various places in search of locations and
events that could satisfy my creative desires. In that
sense, this town has what I'm looking for.
\N<Segi>This town has...? What do you mean by that...?

\N<Painter>The hearts of the people living in this town swirl with
suppressed emotions stemming from being occupied by Luda
troops. Especially for a good-looking woman like yourself...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>It's the sight of such attractive women gritting their teeth
and yet living each day with determination that I find
appealing.

\N<Painter>And I want to capture that image not as something ephemeral
but as something universal... in other words, give it form.
Do you understand this feeling?
\N<Segi>...No, I don't quite understand...

\N<Painter>Heh, that's alright. As long as you fulfill your role, I
will pay you your reward.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>Is this... all right for the end?

\N<Painter>Ah, thank you. I am grateful to you. It looks like it will
turn out to be a good piece thanks to you.
\N<Segi>...No.

\N<Painter>Here is the promised reward. Please accept it without
reservation.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>However... it is still far from the true form I seek. If you
are willing, I would very much like your cooperation again.
\N<Segi>I can't promise anything, but... I'll think about it.
A
\N<Segi>Um...

\N<Painter>Ah, madam. Does your coming here mean that I can interpret
it as you accepting another job?
\N<Segi>...Yes.
\N<Painter>That's wonderful. Actually, I've been waiting for you.
\N<Segi>Waiting... for me?

\N<Painter>Yes. Once I've started painting you as a model, I naturally
want you to stay with me until the very end.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>So... shall we continue from where we left off last time?

\N<Painter>Of course, I will pay you accordingly. And just like last
time, I promise not to lay a finger on your body.
\N<Segi>...Yes.
i_1_セギ05uu
i_1_セギ05u
\N<Segi>May I... ask you something?
\N<Painter>Yes, what would you like to know?
i_1_セギ05a

\N<Segi>How long will it take to complete the painting you are
working on now? I... don't have such knowledge or
experience, it's just out of curiosity.

\N<Painter>Well... it's hard to say definitively, but with today's
work, we should be about halfway there.
\N<Segi>I see... that's good to hear.
\N<Painter>...
\N<Segi>...

In front of the bed, the man took his place and continued to
work on his painting. A moment of silence passed between him
and Segi.
\N<Painter>...Now, may I indulge in a bit of conversation with you?
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Painter>...Indeed, thanks to you, my brush has made significant
progress. But recently, I've been thinking... my heart
sounds an alarm. That this cannot continue as is.
\N<Segi>What... do you mean by that?

\N<Painter>Did I not tell you before? My true purpose is to express the
beautiful melancholy of the women in this town.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>After all... I cannot call it a true completion if I avoid
what I truly want to create.
\N<Segi>...?

\N<Painter>So here's a proposal. No, I'm not asking you to expose your
skin. Instead... could you at least lower the underwear
you're wearing right now?
\N<Segi>Wha... What?!

\N<Painter>Don't misunderstand me. As I've said many times, I'm not
asking you to expose your skin.

\N<Painter>Did I not say earlier? I want to capture the suppressed
emotions that fill this town... especially the sorrowful
feelings hidden within women.

\N<Painter>And you are a very beautiful woman. The expression you show
while enduring shame... that's what drives me to want to
paint it.
\N<Segi>But...

\N<Painter>I understand if you cannot decide immediately. My request
must be causing you great confusion.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Understood, let's add some color to the reward. Please
understand, this is purely for the sake of creation. There
are no indecent intentions whatsoever.

\N<Painter>Besides... as promised, I will not touch you with even a
finger. How about it then...?
\N<Segi>...

Segi thought that might indeed be true. The man's eyes
before her didn't seem to be looking at her in a certain
sense. It felt as if he was staring not at her, but at his
own work of art.

Ever since Luda was stationed in this town, she had been
subjected to many lustful gazes... But the eyes of the man
before her seemed different from those vile eyes.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Segi>I'll have to decline adding color to the reward...
Otherwise, it would make my actions seem like indecent
behavior motivated by money...

\N<Segi>Of course... if we trace it back to the beginning, I
accepted your request for the reward.

\N<Segi>But that doesn't mean I intend to offer my body and seek
more money than desired.
\N<Painter>Then...?
\N<Segi>...
i_1_セギ05b
\N<Segi>...Is this acceptable?

\N<Painter>Yes... I am grateful. Your expression... it's more than I
had hoped for.
\N<Segi>Please stop speaking like that.

Segi reached for her clothing and lowered her pure white
underwear to her knees. Shame and sorrow inevitably appeared
on her face. And that was precisely the scene the man had
desired.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>...Are you nervous? It must be difficult to lower your
underwear in front of a man who is almost a stranger, isn't
it?

\N<Segi>Of course... it's inevitable. There's no way it wouldn't
be...

\N<Painter>My apologies. Then, to distract yourself, perhaps you could
talk about yourself this time?
\N<Segi>About myself...?

\N<Painter>Yes. Knowing the background of the person helps add depth to
the creation they model for.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>Your family? Are they well?
\N<Segi>Yes... I have a husband and one son.

\N<Painter>A son... that's good, wonderful. So you are a wife... and a
mother, then.
\N<Segi>...?

The man's eyes held a smoldering colorless light. Segi did
not understand what that light signified.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>A beautiful married woman like you, alone with a man in a
small room, on a bed, exposing your skin... I wonder what
kind of face your son would make if he saw this scene...

\N<Segi>Stop, please don't say such things. If you're going to talk
like that... I'll have to ask you to stop immediately.

\N<Painter>Ah, my apologies. It slipped out. It's a bad habit of mine.
However... the incongruity between your background and your
current actions is indeed bringing out your charm.

\N<Painter>I'm simply excited by that charm... I hope you can
understand.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>I must capture that charm without missing a thing, and then
immortalize it in my painting. That's all there is to it. So
please, rest assured on your part as well.

\N<Painter>This is by no means infidelity. It is strictly business.
Just work in response to what has been requested of me.
There's no need for shame.

\N<Segi>...I understand. I have no intention of committing
infidelity either.
\N<Painter>Yes... that's fine. Shall we finish up the rest then?
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>Is this... the end then?

\N<Painter>Ah, thank you. I am grateful to you. It looks like it will
turn out to be a good piece thanks to you.
\N<Segi>...No. In return...

\N<Painter>Ah, of course. I swear that today's matter will remain
confidential.

\N<Segi>...? I thought I had declined the offer to add a bonus to my
compensation?

\N<Painter>Please don't say that and accept it. This is purely a token
of my appreciation. It's not something for you to worry
about.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>However... it's still far from the true form I seek. If
you're willing, I would very much like your cooperation
again.
\N<Segi>I can't promise anything, but... I'll consider it.
OriginMenuStatus SetParam param2 Gloomy
A
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>Ah, madam. May I take it that you will accept the job again?
\N<Segi>...Yes.

\N<Painter>I'm relieved. This piece has become unimaginable without
you. You are that significant to me.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>Then... shall we continue from where we left off last time?

\N<Painter>Of course, there will be a proper reward. And just like last
time, I promise not to lay a finger on your body.
\N<Segi>...Yes.
i_3_セギ01u
\N<Segi>May I... ask you something?
\N<Painter>Yes, anything. If it will distract you.
i_3_セギ01a

\N<Segi>...You mentioned before that the progress of the work was
about halfway... How is it now?

Segi lies down on the bed with a puzzled expression,
revealing her underwear in response to the man's request,
just as before.

She seems to have built up some tolerance compared to
before, but it's not something one becomes completely
accustomed to without feeling anything.

\N<Painter>Ah, that matter. It must be on your mind. Actually... it's
mostly complete, but embarrassingly, I'm a bit troubled with
the direction.
\N<Segi>Direction...?

\N<Painter>No need to worry. Since you're taking time out of your
valuable schedule to assist me, I will make sure to create
something satisfactory.
\N<Segi>Oh, no... it's not that I...

How many times has this happened? A strange silence flows
between her and the man who is moving his brush before her
eyes.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>I must say, you as a model are impeccable. If that's the
case, then the problem lies with my own skills.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>To have a perfect model and environment yet not be able to
produce a satisfactory piece... it's truly shameful for me.

\N<Segi>Honestly, I don't quite understand these matters... but it
must be difficult.

\N<Segi>Not that I'm one to speak, but perhaps it would be better
not to overdo it...
\N<Painter>...
\N<Segi>...

The man seemed to be pondering something with a troubled
look. Eventually, he stopped his brush and spoke.

\N<Painter>You may be right. Perhaps I have been overdoing it. The
frustration of knowing the cause yet being unable to resolve
it.
\N<Segi>...?

\N<Painter>Yes... there's no point in being secretive. I have a favor
to ask of you, though it's embarrassing for me.
\N<Segi>...What is it?
\N<Painter>Would you undress and... put this on for me?
\N<Segi>Eh...!?

The man suddenly handed something to Segi. It was a large,
white robe-like garment that had been hanging in the corner
of the room.
\N<Segi>Th-that is...!?

\N<Painter>Please don't misunderstand. There is no ulterior motive. It
is purely for the sake of my art.

\N<Painter>Of course, I'm not asking you to expose your bare skin. You
may use this to cover yourself.
\N<Segi>But...

\N<Painter>I simply wish to glimpse what lies behind your
embarrassment. I believe that only then can I truly express
myself as I desire.
\N<Painter>What do you say...?
\N<Segi>...
I understand.
I can't do that.
了承する
\N<Segi>I understand...

She didn't necessarily trust him, but she could imagine that
the man wasn't lying.

She needed funds for her husband's rescue, and the man
needed satisfactory results for his creation. Segi convinced
herself that she was agreeing to his proposal simply because
the scales of both needs were balanced.
\N<Segi>Wait, please, in exchange...
\N<Painter>Of course, I promise. This will be our little secret.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>How is it? Are you done changing?
\N<Segi>...Yes.
\N<Painter>Good, then let us begin, shall we?
\N<Segi>...
i_3_セギ01b
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>Madam... how do you feel? Is there still... resistance?
\N<Segi>...Of course. There's no way I could be pleased with this...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>I am aware that I am forcing you into an uncomfortable
situation. However, I ask you to bear with it a little
longer.

Lying on the bed in such a precarious state, covered only by
underwear and a large cloth.

The unreliable sense of security and embarrassment brought a
strangely perplexing and enchanting expression to Segi's
face.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Yes, that's it. That expression is exactly what I've been
seeking. It's what I needed for my creation.

\N<Painter>With that... I can immerse myself in this creation. Yes... I
should not have forgotten my original purpose.
\N<Painter>What my work was missing... was a sense of tragedy.
\N<Segi>A sense of tragedy...?

\N<Painter>Having you, the finest material, before me, it seems I had
lost sight of my original goal. I am eternally grateful to
you. My thanks cannot be expressed enough.
\N<Segi>It's not like... Besides...

\N<Painter>Ah, my apologies. My hand had stopped. It seems I was a bit
excited.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>(That's right... The sense of tragedy she radiates. That's
what was missing from my work.)
\N<Painter>(If that's the case, then... for that purpose...)
\N<Segi>Is this... the end?

\N<Painter>Yes, thank you. I am grateful to you. It seems the piece
will turn out well thanks to your help.
\N<Segi>...No. In return...

\N<Painter>Ah, of course. I swear today's matter will go no further
than us.

\N<Segi>...? I thought I had declined the offer to add a bonus to my
compensation?

\N<Painter>Please don't say that and accept it. This is purely a token
of my feelings. It's not something for you to worry about.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>However... it's still far from the true form I seek. If
you're willing, I would very much like your cooperation
again.
\N<Segi>I can't promise anything... but I'll consider it.
OriginMenuStatus SetParam param2 Gloomy
A
それは出来ない

\N<Segi>...I must decline. I'm sorry, but that is something I cannot
do...

\N<Painter>Is that so... It can't be helped. It's not an act that can
be forced, so I shall give up gracefully.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>Is this... the end then?

\N<Painter>Yes, thank you. I am grateful to you. It seems the piece
will turn out well thanks to your help.
\N<Segi>...No. In return...

\N<Painter>Ah, of course. I swear today's matter will go no further
than us.

\N<Painter>...I should be able to manage on my own from here. Thank
you. I am grateful to you.
\N<Segi>...
A
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Ah, madam. You've come again. I was actually worried about
you, as you seemed to have some concerns after our last
session.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>But I'm glad. It's reassuring to see you've returned here.
As I mentioned before, my work is unimaginable without you
now.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>So... shall we continue from where we left off last time?

\N<Painter>Of course, I will pay a proper reward. And like last time, I
promise not to lay a finger on your body.
\N<Segi>...Yes.
i_3_セギ01b
\N<Painter>...
\N<Segi>...

Just like before, Segi undressed, wrapped her body in the
white cloth prepared by the man, and lay down on the bed.
Waiting for this, the man began to move his brush.

\N<Painter>...It must be boring just lying there. So, may I ask about
yourself just for fun?
\N<Segi>My... I believe I've already told you about that before...

\N<Painter>Yes, indeed you have, but if it's not too much trouble, I'd
like to know a bit more deeply.

\N<Segi>What do you intend to do with that knowledge? And... is it
really necessary?

\N<Painter>Well... as you say, it's not necessarily so, but let's say
it's needed for this occasion.
\N<Segi>...

The man's intentions were unclear, but hoping to alleviate
the discomfort of the situation even slightly, Segi began to
open up.

\N<Segi>I am... fighting in the military drills in place of my
husband who is not here due to certain circumstances.
\N<Painter>Oh...? A woman like yourself... must have quite a struggle.

\N<Painter>Ah, I see. So that's why you accepted a request from someone
like me as a means of support.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Your dedication to your family is commendable. However, I
surmise that fighting among such strong warriors must be
extremely harsh.

\N<Painter>That... how have you managed to survive through such harsh
battles?
\N<Segi>That is...
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>...I see. A double-edged spiritual medicine that strengthens
the body and mind but also affects both physically and
mentally.

\N<Painter>So, about that matter of Mind Luda, by taking it, have you
actually experienced any effects or abnormalities in your
body or mind?

\N<Segi>...It's rare for me to feel it myself, but perhaps that's
why I'm doing something like this now.
\N<Painter>...I see.

The man suddenly began to ponder something. Then, after a
while, he raised his face and opened his mouth towards Segi.

\N<Painter>Now it all makes sense. If that's the case, it's very
convenient for me that you've taken the spiritual medicine,
and I can only be grateful.
\N<Segi>Grateful... you say?

\N<Painter>Yes... So you have such circumstances. It was indeed good to
confirm.

\N<Painter>My choice was not mistaken. What will happen from now on
will be for both your sake and mine. I am relieved.
\N<Segi>Eh...?
\N<Segi>Wha...!!??
\N<Luda Soldier>Heh, kept you waiting, huh? Are we doing this or what?
\N<Segi>Who are you...!? What is this...!?

\N<Painter>Ah, as you can see, these are the Luda soldiers. They
agreed readily when I explained the situation to them.
i_4_セギ03u
\N<Segi>The situation...!? What on earth are you talking about!?
i_4_セギ03a

\N<Luda Soldier>Heh, sorry for the suddenness, ma'am. But hey, not just the
painter sensei here, how about you entertain us too?
\N<Segi>Wha...!!??

Suddenly, a group of Luda burst through the door and
forcefully entered the room. They restrained a flustered
Segi and began to strip off their own clothes.
\N<Segi>Stop... please stop this! What in the world is...!?

Segi turned back towards the painter and questioned him
loudly. However, the painter responded very calmly, in stark
contrast to her.

\N<Painter>Unfortunately, I cannot stop this. Because this is something
I myself have requested. Besides... you are terribly
attractive right now.
\N<Segi>You requested this...!? What are you talking about...!?

\N<Luda Soldier>Heh, when this sensei told us he wanted a certain woman
violated, I wondered what was going on.

\N<Luda Soldier>Ah, it's truly a stroke of luck. To think I'd get to bed a
fine woman like you and even get paid for it, right, painter
sensei?

\N<Painter>Yes, of course I'll pay. I want you to fully indulge your
desires with her.
\N<Segi>Eh...!!??

\N<Luda Soldier>That's right, ma'am. No use resisting now, just give up and
let it happen quietly.
\N<Segi>Such...!! Wait...!?
i_4_セギ03b
\N<Segi>Wha...!!??

The Luda soldiers held Segi in a tight grip and pulled down
her underwear. In an instant, Segi's scream echoed within
the confined space.
\N<Segi>No... nooo...!!

\N<Luda Soldier>Heh, you're the wife rumored to be participating in those
military drills, right? Flaunting such an erotic outfit in
public... I've been wanting to do you for a while now.

\N<Luda Soldier>Exactly, it's poison for the eyes to see something like
that. But who would've thought my wish would come true here.
i_4_セギ03c
\N<Segi>...!
\N<Segi>Stop... sto...stop...!

\N<Luda Soldier>You can't dress like that and then play innocent now, can
you? Plus, coming to a room with a man alone means you were
expecting this to happen, weren't you?

\N<Segi>Don't be ridiculous...! Who would willingly...! This is
just... a request...!

\N<Luda Soldier>A request, huh? Well, we've got a request too. A fine one at
that—to violate you.
\N<Segi>Ha...ah...! Stop...no...ah...!
\N<Luda Soldier>How is it, Painter Sensei, how does it feel?
\N<Painter>Ha, haha... It's the best, beyond my expectations.
i_4_セギ04u
\N<Segi>Ha...ah...! Ah! Ah!
i_4_セギ04a
\N<Segi>Ah...nn! Haa! Nn! Ah...huff!

\N<Painter>Ah... It's the best, truly beyond expectations. It seems I
made the right decision in commissioning you guys.

It was a terribly bizarre scene. The painter, with a faint
smile on his face, watched Segi cry out in violation and
moved his brush swiftly.
\N<Segi>Nn...nn! No more...stop...nn!

\N<Painter>The face of a beautiful woman filled with despair and tears,
and her heated body...haha... Thank you once again, madam.
Thanks to you, it seems I can create a fine piece this
time...

\N<Luda Soldier>Hehe, is that so? That's good to hear. So, Painter Sensei,
aren't you going to join in?

\N<Painter>That's not what I'm focused on right now... I want to
concentrate.

The painter's words were not a lie. He did not participate
in the violation himself, nor did he stop it; he simply
continued to move his brush.

\N<Luda Soldier>Hehe, what an odd guy. Well then, I'll concentrate on my
work without holding back.
\N<Segi>Ah! Ah! Haa...nnn!

\N<Luda Soldier>Hey, Painter Sensei. Since the lady is putting her body on
the line like this, make sure you create a good piece,
alright?
\N<Painter>Of course... I don't need you to tell me that.
\N<Segi>It was all a lie...wasn't it!? Everything you said...!!

\N<Painter>There's no doubt that you are the best material for me. And
the fact that you showed me your best expression by doing
this is exactly what I expected. There's no lie in that.

In response to Segi's tearful questioning, the painter began
to eloquently sing praises while still moving his brush.

\N<Painter>However... it is true that I had some concerns about doing
this. I thought it might hurt you, your husband, or your
son.
\N<Segi>Then...ah! Ahn! Stop it right now...haa...stop it...!

\N<Painter>But those concerns were unfounded. The so-called spirit
medicine took care of them.

\N<Painter>Because... isn't it so? By doing this, you can release your
sexual urges. And I get the best material.

\N<Painter>Fu, fufu... Isn't this what they call killing two birds with
one stone? Right?
\N<Segi>Ah! Haa! You're joking...!

\N<Painter>So... I want you to show me everything, yourself. And I will
capture that image without missing a detail.

\N<Painter>Fu, fufu...fufu... This is it... This is what I've been
seeking...
\N<Segi>You're crazy... This is madness... You are...you are...!
セギ半裸_困る
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>...Are you okay physically? You have children, after all.
I've told them not to be too reckless.
セギ半裸_困る
\N<Segi>...You're insane... You are insane...

\N<Painter>Perhaps that's true. Even if it weren't, you have every
right to denounce me.

\N<Painter>And... you also have the right to receive proper
compensation.
セギ半裸_怒り
\N<Segi>I don't need it... I don't want such dirty money...

\N<Painter>Whether it's clean or dirty, money is money. You should
accept it graciously.

\N<Painter>Besides... if you don't accept the compensation, all that
remains for you is the fact that you were defiled by several
men here.

\N<Painter>Of course I am sane. Although I do feel sorry for you.

Lying on the bed, Segi closed her eyes deeply. The tragedy
that had befallen her in this place days ago resurfaced in
her mind. Then she quietly opened her mouth.

\N<Segi>...You must be an excellent artist. But as a person, you're
missing something important.

\N<Painter>You may be right about that. But even if that's the case, it
doesn't bother me.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>No matter how much human emotion or common sense one
possesses, it doesn't reflect in what I create. If it's not
reflected, then it's meaningless to me.

\N<Painter>In that sense, I truly have nothing but gratitude for you
who made me realize this.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>So, what will you do? The next steps are up to you.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Segi>...

Segi: No matter how much I try not to remember, the events
that happened here come back to me, and my body stiffens
without realizing it.

The man in front of her, who continued to paint as if he
could see right through her heart, spoke to her.

\N<Painter>Ah, please relax. There's no need to be so tense. Those
people will not come here anymore. They have served their
purpose.

\N<Painter>It's just the two of us here. And unlike those men from
before, I will not harm you.

\N<Segi>...Words are cheap. How can I trust what you say after what
happened?
\N<Segi>First of all... do you even realize that you've hurt others?

\N<Painter>Haha... that's quite harsh. Then, shall I tell you something
that will make my words trustworthy?

\N<Painter>You see, I am what you might call impotent. So even if I
were to lust after you, there's nothing I could do about it.
By the way, that's why my wife left me.
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Painter>It's an embarrassing story, but does this make me a bit more
trustworthy?
\N<Segi>...
i_5_セギ07b
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Ah, and... perhaps what you referred to as something I lack
as a person is exactly that. Haha, you make me realize many
things.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Painter>In contrast, what about you?
\N<Segi>Me...? What do you mean by that?

\N<Painter>Well, your breathing has been erratic since earlier... and
your cheeks seem flushed.
\N<Painter>Could it be... that you want to engage in such acts with me?
\N<Segi>...Wha...!?

Indeed, as the man said, Segi's face grew redder, her soft
skin slightly sweaty and flushed.

This was due to the erosion of Mind Luda, but contrary to
the abnormal changes in her own body, Segi denied the man's
words.

\N<Segi>...What kind of joke is that? I told you I have a loving
husband.

\N<Painter>Right, of course. So then, is it the effect of that drug we
talked about earlier?

\N<Painter>Despite your strong will, the phenomenon that might be
called erosion is certainly progressing.
\N<Segi>...
i_5_セギ07c
\N<Segi>...

In fact, the man might be right. The cause of her
uncontrollable arousal was undoubtedly the erosion from the
spiritual drug.

And with that impulse only being able to be released in such
a manner, a fierce shame and regret sprouted within her
actions.

\N<Segi>...Even if the erosion of Mind Luda is happening to me...
what of it?

\N<Painter>You have a strong will. That must make it all the more
painful for you. Don't you ever wish to just give in?

\N<Segi>To wish to be consumed... that's out of the question. No
matter what impulses come, I believe my will shall prevail
in the end.

\N<Painter>Hmm... so you don't deny the impulses themselves. Then
indeed, what happened before was for your sake as well.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>I pray for your path to be filled with happiness and for
your impulses to be safely released.
\N<Segi>...I don't need prayers from you.
\N<Painter>No... let me pray for you.

\N<Painter>Because right now... you have a look of someone who is
sexually unfulfilled.

\N<Painter>...Excellent work. With this, I won't be lacking materials
for a while. It was truly good to work with you.
\N<Segi>...Are you leaving this town?

\N<Painter>Yes, it seems so. By the way, don't worry about what
happened here. I have no intention of speaking to others
about it.

\N<Painter>It's a mutual understanding. After all, you've come to know
my embarrassing secret that my wife has grown tired of me,
haha.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Painter>Thank you for everything. Perhaps we'll meet again somewhere
someday. Until then... take care.
